input.sentences: the race had finally started and i got started running .
it was going to be a long event so i needed to pace myself .
there were tons of other people running .
some people were injured and had to have someone help them .
at the end of the race there was a live band playing .
output.sentences: The running started for the race.
For this event everyone kept pace.
Tons of people were running in this race.
People injured in the race were helped by firemen.
